00040         class US_API_EXPORT ConfigCallBack : public CallBack {
00041         public:
00042                 friend class ConfigTable;
00043 
00044                 ConfigCallBack(void);
00045                 virtual ~ConfigCallBack(void);
00046 
00047                 int32 init(char* name);
00048 
00049                 virtual int32 perform(void*)
00050                 {
00051                         return SUCCESS;
00052                 }
00053 
00054                 bool isEnabled(void)
00055                 {
00056                         return enabled;
00057                 }
00058 
00059                 void setEnabled(bool flag)
00060                 {
00061                         enabled = flag;
00062                 }
00063         protected:
00064                 /* pointer to ConfigTable object */
00065                 ConfigTable* ct;
00066 
00067                 /* key (property name) */
00068                 char* key;
00069 
00070                 /* property type */
00071                 uint8 type;
00072 
00073                 /* object type id */
00074                 uint16 otype_id;
00075 
00076                 /* the integer value for this key */
00077                 int32* ival;
00078 
00079                 /* the double value for this key */
00080                 double* dval;
00081 
00082                 /* the string value for this key */
00083                 char* sval;
00084 
00085                 /* size of the string value */
00086                 uint32 svalsz;
00087 
00088                 /* the object value for this key */
00089                 void* oval;
00090 
00091                 /* custom data pointer */
00092                 void* userdata;
00093 
00094                 /* flag: callback enabled or disabled */
00095                 bool enabled;
00096         private:
00097                 /* copy constructor not avilable */
00098                 ConfigCallBack(ConfigCallBack&)
00099                 {
00100                 }
00101         };

00649                 // property descriptor
00650                 struct pdesc_t {
00651                         // optional property descriptor
00652                         Property* property;
00653 
00654                         // property type
00655                         uint8 type;
00656 
00657                         // object type id
00658                         uint16 otype_id;
00659

00665

00667                         void* user_data;
00668 
00669                         // value is null
00670                         uint32 is_null;
00671                 };
